title: 1979 U.S. Women's Open
text:
The 1979 U.S. Women's Open was the 34th <a href="U.S.%20Women%27s%20Open">U.S. Women's Open</a>, held July 12–15 at <a href="Brooklawn%20Country%20Club">Brooklawn Country Club</a> in <a href="Fairfield%2C%20Connecticut">Fairfield, Connecticut</a>.
<a href="Jerilyn%20Britz">Jerilyn Britz</a> won her first <a href="LPGA%20Tour">LPGA Tour</a> event (and only <a href="Women%27s%20major%20golf%20championships">major</a>), two shots ahead of runners-up <a href="Debbie%20Massey">Debbie Massey</a> and 
Co-leading after the first round and leading after the second, Britz shot a four-over-par 75 in the third round on Saturday. She entered the final round three strokes behind Massey and shot a two-under 69 for an even-par 284 total.
Final leaderboard.
"Sunday, July 15, 1979"
